Kodak VR35 K40

About

Camera for snapshots. It was offered by Kodak from 1986 to 1993

How to Use

Basic instructions for using the Kodak VR35 K40:

  1. Load film (done already)
  2. Slide open lens cover (turns on camera too)
  3. Look through the viewfinder and frame your shot
  4. Slide up flash button to activate pop-up flash indoors
  5. Press the shutter button to take the picture

Specifications

  • Lens: 35mm Kodak Ektanar
  • Focus: Fixed Focus
  • Year: 1986
